title: Strategic Growth Operator
job_overview:
Position Overview
We are seeking a highly driven and detail-oriented Strategic Growth Operator (SGO) to lead the implementation and scaling of a high-output, AI-powered content network. This individual will oversee systems, manage virtual teams, coordinate daily deliverables, and ensure all workflows align with growth milestones and brand mission. The SGO will serve as the operational backbone of the organization.

Key Responsibilities
• • Oversee and manage AI agent deployment for article and podcast production.
• • Coordinate daily content output across 10+ languages and multiple audience verticals.
• • Manage and communicate with virtual assistant teams to ensure timely execution.
• • Implement automation tools (Zapier, Make, etc.) to streamline publishing workflows.
• • Track publishing metrics, identify gaps, and optimize performance across channels.
• • Lead milestone planning, sprint execution, and weekly performance reviews.
• • Ensure all content meets brand standards for tone, theme, and biblical alignment.
• • Work directly with tools like Notion, Airtable, WordPress, ElevenLabs, and scheduling apps.
• • Establish quality control processes and improve operational efficiency over time.
• • Report directly to ownership/stakeholders on KPI performance and scaling recommendations.
Requirements
• • Proven experience in digital operations, content publishing, or startup execution.
• • Strong background in managing remote teams and asynchronous work environments.
• • Working knowledge of AI content workflows and automation tools.
• • Comfortable with structured content systems (e.g., CMS, databases, SEO tools).
• • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
• • Self-directed, entrepreneurial, and results-focused mindset.
• • Experience in faith-based or values-driven content environments is a plus.
Role Details
This is a full-time, remote role with flexible working hours. The SGO will be evaluated on execution consistency, growth milestones achieved, and operational effectiveness. Compensation is competitive and includes performance-based bonuses tied to key growth metrics.
